Name: Stoney's Adventure
About the game: A mysterious evil-doer has emerged from the unknown to create a sinister new world. With nobody else left to defeat him, it is on you and any other misguided souls you stumble upon to put an end to his dastardly plot. Jump, fly and race through several lands - from the sunny oasis of the Diamond Desert, to the gloomy swamps of the Mystic Stormlands - to save the world from the most dangerous weapon ever constructed. 6 Playable Characters with unique powers and abilities. 60+ Levels spanning across 10 fully explorable worlds Multiple approaches and secret ways through the storyline 100 Shiny Golden Rocks to collect A complete original soundtrack featuring over 60+ songs
